headline: Instabase Appoints Omkar Pendse as Chief Product and Technology Officer to Accelerate Next Phase of AI Innovation

headline: Temu challenges Amazon for cross-border e-commerce dominance
summary: Temu has sprinted to the top of the leader board of e-commerce retailers selling in overseas markets. The post Temu challenges Amazon for cross-border e-commerce dominance appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Here's How Much a $1000 Investment in eBay Made 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today

headline: eBay unveils climate transition plan to reach 2045 net-zero target
summary: The transition plan comes almost a year after the e-commerce giant had its net-zero and emissions reduction goals validated by the Science Based Targets initiative.
